sentences.en: Ingrain diamter determination , fist the desulfurization rate should be ensured, to obtain the optimized economic index.
sentences.cn: 石灰石粒径确定原则为在保证一定脱硫率的前提下, 获取最优的经济指标.

sentences.en: Ingrain into your website, your unique affiliate links, wherever you see fit.
sentences.cn: 植入到你的网站, 你的独特从属环节, 你认为在哪里.

sentences.en: Ingrain paper: Paper finished with a mottle surface used for book covers, etc.
sentences.cn: 斑纹纸: 加工造成有斑点花纹的纸, 作书皮等用.

sentences.en: Just ingrain it in your brain.
sentences.cn: 只要把它深印在你的脑海中.

sentences.en: Mother tried to ingrain respect for our elders in us.
sentences.cn: 母亲努力教育我们尊重老人.

sentences.en: Training camp, he said, will quickly ingrain those principles.
sentences.cn: 他说训练营会很快让那些原则根深蒂固.

words.tran_cn: 根深蒂固的；彻头彻尾的；生染的
使根深蒂固（ingrain的过去分词形式）；生染；就原料染色
生染的；原纱染色的；根深蒂固的

trans.tran_cn: 生染的纤维，原料染色，本质
